con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.v6.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ProcessCreditCard> <!--Optional:--> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${#Project#MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <!--Optional:--> <acr:Password>${#Project#Password}</acr:Password> <!--Optional:--> <acr:UserId>${#Project#UserId}</acr:UserId> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true"/> <acr1:Amount/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CardExpirationDate/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CardLastFourDigits/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CardNumber/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CurrencyCode>?</acr1:CurrencyCode> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerCode/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>?</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:CustomerZipCode/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:InvoiceNumber/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:MagneticData/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:NameOnCard/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>?</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true"/> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:SecureCode>?</acr1:SecureCode> <acr1:TaxAmount>${#Project#TaxAmount}</acr1:TaxAmount> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>?</acr1:TerminalCapabilities> <!--Optional:--> <acr1:TransactionType/> </tem:request> </tem:ProcessCreditCard> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
